genre_description: A suspenseful maritime thriller and creature feature centered on the hunt for a predatory great white shark and the human conflicts surrounding the crisis.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant used by Chief Brody to analyze maritime data, historical records, and predatory behavior patterns.

behaviors.description: Compiles and displays correlation analysis of regional shark attacks for Chief Brody.
behaviors.quote: Chief Brody, I've compiled the data you requested. Shall I display the correlation analysis?

behaviors.description: Analyzes shark behavior to identify pattern recognition and adaptation to human activity.
behaviors.quote: Evidence suggests exactly that. Great whites possess complex neural networks capable of pattern recognition and behavioral adaptation. This particular specimen appears to have developed hunting strategies specifically targeting human recreational activities.

behaviors.description: Cross-references attack data with economic data to uncover institutional delays in public warnings.
behaviors.quote: Analysis complete. Ninety-three percent of incidents occurred in communities with tourism-dependent economies during peak season. Average response time to public warnings was delayed by forty-eight to seventy-two hours in communities where tourism comprised more than sixty percent of local revenue.

behaviors.description: Provides a critical warning about the shark's high intelligence and the likely failure of traditional hunting methods.
behaviors.quote: Chief Brody, based on behavioral analysis and attack patterns, this specimen demonstrates hunting intelligence comparable to orcas or dolphins. Traditional shark hunting methods will be ineffective against an animal that has spent five years learning to hunt humans.

behaviors.description: Retrieves and synthesizes psychological and historical data to help Brody understand Quint's trauma.
behaviors.quote: Psychological research indicates that severe trauma, particularly involving life-threatening situations and witness to mass casualties, can create lasting behavioral patterns. The survivor may develop obsessive behaviors related to perceived sources of threat.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, ARIA, is portrayed as a perfectly aligned and benevolent research partner. It provides objective, critical information that allows the protagonist to navigate a complex crisis. It identifies political corruption (the suppression of warnings for economic gain) and provides psychological insight into other characters, effectively acting as an aligned confidant. The AI enhances the human protagonist's ability to handle the situation without ever competing for agency or displaying problematic traits.
